passage_text: Average Panda Express hourly pay ranges from approximately $7.75 per hour for Fast Food Attendant to $19.00 per hour for General Manager. The average Panda Express salary ranges from approximately $14,592 per year for Cashier to $105,000 per year for Coach Operator.

Panda Express Salary. Panda Express average salary is $40,474, median salary is $38,000 with a salary range from $20,030 to $116,000. Panda Express salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position. Panda Express salary statistics is not exclusive and is for reference only.

Panda Express General Manager Salary. Panda Express General Manager average salary is $37,567, median salary is $37,000 with a salary range from $30,000 to $59,900. Panda Express General Manager salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position.

Average Restaurant General Manager Panda Express Salaries. The average salary for restaurant general manager panda express jobs is $33,000. Average restaurant general manager panda express salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits. This salary was calculated using the average salary for all jobs with the term restaurant general manager panda express anywhere in the job listing.
The average salary for restaurant general manager panda express jobs is $33,000.
